mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.permission FROM role_menu rm LEFT JOIN menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = #{roleName} AND r.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0

SELECT r.role_id, r.role_name, m.permission FROM role_menu rm LEFT JOIN menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0

SELECT r.role_id, r.role_name, r.del_flag FROM user_role ur LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND r.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0
